result.title: Report on regional bioeconomy profile and social, economic and environmental impacts (Italy and Bulgaria)
result.description: The report will define the regional bioeconomies and their potentials in the two case study regions, and outline potential programmes of measures and their socio-economic and environmental impacts. The results will be discussed with relevant regional stakeholders in Task 6.2 and 6.3.
